Night Golf

Proin vel venenatis mi. Curabitur erat lectus, dignissim

The Only Floodlit Golf Course in Da Nang

The only floodlit golf course in Da Nang, all 18 holes at Ba Na Hills Golf Club are lit up at night, offering opportunity to enjoy a round of golf in the evening or as the sun sets spectacularly over the surrounding mountains. Playing golf at night provides the perfect opportunity to enjoy a second round for the day by playing at night. Promotions applicable.
A night round is the perfect end to any golf trip for those that have a late flight from Danang. Dinner either pre or post golf in our Dining Room, take a shower and the club will arrange transport to the airport for you.
